title: Parting Hair with a Spartan Spear
topic: The Spartan Spear Hair Parting (Ancient Rome)
script: If you thought modern bridal up-dos were stressful, you wouldn't survive Ancient Rome. Before a Roman bride could consummate her marriage, her hair had to be parted not with a comb... but with a razor sharp weapon. Under the supervision of older women, the bride's hair was literally split down the middle using a "hasta caelibaris"â€”an iron spear that had officially been used to kill a gladiator or an enemy soldier! It showed that the bride was conquered, and supposedly blessed her with aggressive fertility. Imagine trying to sit still for that!
